abstract: Pres Obama ends his three-day Western trip in Denver, rallying thousands of college students by promoting new rules to expedite and ease repayment terms for graduates burdened with federal student loans; enthusiasm of students belies struggle Obama will face if he wants to win Colorado again in 2012.
snippet: President Obama promoted new rules to expedite and ease repayment for graduates with federal student loans.
lead_paragraph: President Obama promoted new rules to expedite and ease repayment for graduates with federal student loans.

headline.main: In Denver, Obama Asks Students for Support
headline.print_headline: In Denver, Obama Asks Students For Support
headline.seo: In Denver, Obama Seeks Student Support
